text: Ikaŵeje aŵala ŵaakulupilile ni kutendaga yambone, ni kunkolangaga Allah kwejinji, ni kulikulupusya achimisyene panyuma pakutendeledwa lupuso (pakwajanga achimakafili ni ilaanga pa ilaanga yao yaakwimba yakwagamba Asilamu). Sano pangakaŵapa tamanyilile aŵala ŵatesile lupuso kwagalauchila kutagalauchile
